verses.text: \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, how are they increased that trouble me! many are* they that rise up against me.
Many there be* which say of my soul, There is* no help for him in God. Selah.
But thou, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, art* a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.+ 3.3 for: or, about*
I cried unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.
I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** sustained me.
I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves* against me round about.
Arise, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon* the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.
Salvation belongeth* unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: thy blessing is* upon thy people. Selah.
